modName: Requiem - VERY OUTDATED - Melee Weapon Range Fix
summary:
dont use very outdated

Simple patch that makes the Melee Weapon Range Fix mod work with Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
dont use very outdated

Welcome to me first mod! 
I was getting frustrated that my poor magelings and light-armoured characters ate axes and greatswords to the face when I'd "clearly" avoided the attack. 

This patch adjusts Requiem's melee weapon ranges to those of [b]Polymorpher's[/b] Melee Weapon Range Fix. This file replaces Melee Weapon Range Fix's plugin and requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn - simply load it after Requiem. 
As this is my first "mod", per say, I would be interested if I messed anything and or messed anything up. 

Credit to [b]Ogerboss[/b], [b]Xarrian[/b] and [b]Polymorpher [/b]for their respective mods.
author: TREK_94
